inclusion.criterion: Histologic diagnosis of high grade malignant glioma
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Solitary, supratentorial lesions that do not cross the midline
inclusion.label: unknown
met
inclusion.evidence: physical exam and lab studies were normal

inclusion.criterion: Adequate hematologic reserve with WBC>=3000/mm3, absolute neutrophils >=1500/mm3 and platelets >=100,000/ mm3
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Pre-enrollment chemistry parameters must show: bilirubin<1.5X the institutional upper limit of normal (IUNL); AST or ALT<2.5X IUNL and creatinine<1.5X IUNL
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients must agree to use a medically effective method of contraception during and for a period of three months after the treatment period
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must be able to understand and give written informed consent
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Known hypersensitivity or allergy to BCNU (carmustine) or other components of the Gliadel wafer, such as polifeprosan polymer
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Women who are pregnant or lactating
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: He is in relation with several partners

exclusion.criterion: Posterior Fossa or Brain stem tumor
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Open communication of the resection cavity with the ventricular system and tumors that cross the midline
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: The dorsum and sole of the foot was unaffected

exclusion.criterion: Concurrent severe medical (e.g., active infection, acute hepatitis, cardiac arrhythmia, unstable angina, congestive heart failure, uncontrolled diabetes mellitus, uncontrolled seizures, pulmonary insufficiency, pulmonary fibrosis, pulmonary embolus, etc) or psychiatric illness
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: His physical exam and lab studies were normal otherwise

exclusion.criterion: Patients with significant intercurrent medical or psychiatric conditions that would place them at increased risk or affect their ability to receive or comply with treatment or post-treatment clinical monitoring
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a confirmed diagnosis of Tinea pedis infection, but meets most inclusion criteria and does not have any exclusion criteria that would make them likely ineligible.
